"Coffee-infused candles" - Create scented candles that have a coffee-like aroma and include a small coffee bean in the center that can be ground up and used to make a cup of coffee.

"Coffee maker with built-in grinder" - Develop a coffee maker that includes a built-in grinder, allowing users to grind their own coffee beans and easily make a cup of coffee without having to purchase pre-ground coffee.

"Coffee maker with digital display" - Create a coffee maker with a digital display that allows users to set the time and temperature of their coffee, as well as track their coffee consumption over time.

"Coffee maker with multiple brewing options" - Develop a coffee maker that includes multiple brewing options, such as a French press, pour-over, or espresso, allowing users to choose the brewing method that best suits their preferences.

"Coffee maker with built-in milk frother" - Create a coffee maker that includes a built-in milk frother, allowing users to easily make lattes, cappuccinos, and other milk-based coffee drinks without having to purchase a separate milk frother.
